landingPage.aboutMeText: I am Lukas, 22, and coding is my passion.

contactPage.headline: Contact Me
contactPage.reachOut: Feel free to reach out with any questions, inquiries, or collaboration opportunities. Your feedback is valuable!
contactPage.responding: Thank you for your message. You will receive a confirmation of receipt; otherwise, please try again. Please note that the confirmation might end up in the spam folder.

projectsPage.headline: My Projects (Currently working on, so only Dummies)

aboutMe.headline: About Me
aboutMe.greeting: Hi, I'm Lukas Pabst, a Software Developer based in Mühlhausen/Thüringen.
aboutMe.work: Currently working as a Software Developer at Finanz-Data GmbH, Gotha.
aboutMe.myCurrentFocus: Currently, my work is centered around:
aboutMe.restServiceDevelopment: REST-Service-Development with Java and Spring Boot
aboutMe.languages: Fluent in German (native) and proficient in English (written and spoken).
aboutMe.hobbies: Hobbies include weightlifting, programming and reading.
aboutMe.contact: Reach out to me at lukas.pabst.business@outlook.de or use the build in Contact
aboutMe.lookingForward: Looking forward to connecting and discussing exciting opportunities!
